en: The border resembles a [pulse freq=3][color=CRIMSON]war zone[/color][/pulse]. Barricades, armored vehicles, and elite guards stand ready. Today is when the resistance planned to strike.
[wave amp=25 freq=3][color=YELLOW]EMERGENCY BROADCAST[/color][/wave]: All of Spud is under [color=RED]martial law[/color]. "The Resistance" has launched attacks against government facilities.

Anyone aiding these [color=CRIMSON]extremists[/color] faces [color=DARK_VIOLET]immediate processing[/color]. The Ministry confirms: [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] remains safe for all [color=DARK_ORANGE]loyal potatoes[/color].
[color=YELLOW]Rioting has broken out[/color] in multiple sectors. Resistance cells have attacked three [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color] facilities.
Their goal: access the central database with all production records. Any sign of disloyalty means processing.
We've captured several resistance operatives, including Officer Sasha.
The [tornado radius=3 freq=2][color=CRIMSON]real traitors[/color][/tornado] are those who [color=DARK_VIOLET]feed our people to each other[/color]. You can't stop the truth!
She's dragged away, still shouting: [color=CHARTREUSE]The people will know what's in their food![/color]

The [color=CRIMSON]traitor[/color] will be [pulse freq=3][color=DARK_VIOLET]processed immediately[/color][/pulse]. A special batch of [color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color], made from the terrorists themselves.
All border crossings are [color=RED]suspended[/color] except for essential personnel with [color=GOLD]Level Alpha clearance[/color].
This scanner [color=YELLOW]cannot be fooled[/color]. Sound the alarm immediately for anyone without proper clearance.
A potato in official uniform approaches with seemingly perfect Alpha credentials.
A tiny blue card falls from the folder. "[wave amp=15 freq=3][color=CHARTREUSE]The roots grow deep.[/color][/wave]", they mutter as they pick up the card.
"Process them through, ignoring the scanner alerts" (Help the resistance)
"Sound the alarm immediately" (Betray the resistance)
Relief shows in their eyes. "[color=CHARTREUSE]For Sasha. For Spud.[/color]" They disappear toward the central database.
Horror dawns on their face. "[color=CRIMSON]You traitor! We trusted you![/color]" They're quickly surrounded by guards.
"Excellent work. Your loyalty will be rewarded."
Suddenly, the facility [color=YELLOW]shakes with explosions[/color]. The resistance attack has begun, regardless of your choice.
Do I stay at my post and hope this blows over, or [color=CHARTREUSE]take a stand[/color] and risk everything to expose the truth?
"I can't abandon my duty. I'll stay quiet and hope for the best."
"I've been complicit for too long. It's time to fight for what's right."
[pulse freq=3][color=YELLOW]Move quickly![/color][/pulse] Security is scrambling - this is your only chance to escape!
